page.title: 20GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {Bulldog}is a game we often play at school. You need about 20 people to start with. The person who is on stands in the middle of two lines about 15 metres apart. The person who is on calls out someones name, that person has to run to the other line without been tug. If he is tug he joins the person who is on and the process is repeated. {Ring a ring o' roses}is a very old game which originated after the great plague which covered the country in 1664. People carried posies of flowers over their mouths to stop them catching the plague. As children say the rhyme they do the actions too: Ring a ring o' roses, A pocket full of posies, Atishoo, Atishoo, We all fall down.
